column4: Has anyone here used creative MP3 players with ubuntu? If so, what's the experience been like?
Why not just try it and see? You might be surprised.
I don't like to be surprised
is there some statistical info regarding the number of failed downloads?
Not sure what your asking there?
how often can one expect to get a corrupt ISO?
One can expect to get a failed ISO......never. How could you ever know in advance?
IDE bad
IDE bad why?
I thought there might be a precedent or statistic for bad images
No the image is perfect on the server always.
Block level controller in IDE mode doesn't seem to like modern OS's much. I was thinking he should check the drive's firmware however dangerous if one doesn't
that's regarding Sata in IDE
Im using IDE mode with 2 500GB SATAs with no issues. So???
not an issues if it's actually a physical IDE
I think your confused. SATA has different modes in the bios.
prolly not everyone will have issues. Do you use AMD or Intel?
AMD Phenom
I know this using Sata as IDE has the potential for headaches...
Headaches? Its like the most reliable one to use. Its like a default setting on most boards.
who makes your controller (North/South Bridge) ?
